meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, Dallas, TX

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes of the February 26, 2025 City Council Meeting
Authorize revisions to the Financial Management Performance Criteria
agenda_items.description: Add language that establishes an Employee Benefit Reserve in Unassigned Fund Balance; clarify the pension benefit adjustment approval process; change the comparison of the disabled and over 65 property tax exemption; exclude certificate of obligation debt repaid by Enterprise Funds; add language for systematic funding of retirement systems.

agenda_items.title: An ordinance amending Ordinance No. 32861
agenda_items.description: Authorize certain transfers and appropriation adjustments for FY 2024-25 for maintenance and operation of various departments.

agenda_items.title: Authorize settlement of lawsuit Jon Puryear EMS CE LLC v. City of Dallas
Authorize settlement of lawsuit Laura Alonzo v. City of Dallas
Authorize settlement of bodily injury claims by Sterling Bradshaw
A resolution authorizing an increase in the joint election agreement
agenda_items.description: Increase in election services contract for the November 5, 2024, special election.

agenda_items.title: Authorize interlocal agreement with Dallas Independent School District
agenda_items.description: Provide emergency medical services during football games and other District events.

agenda_items.title: Authorize a five-year sole source services agreement for asset tracking system
Authorize Standard Utility Agreement with the State of Texas
agenda_items.description: For water pipeline encasement extensions in State Highway 205.

financial_items.description: Settlement of lawsuit Jon Puryear EMS CE LLC v. City of Dallas
Settlement of lawsuit Laura Alonzo v. City of Dallas
